issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When orc_vectorization_ppd.q is run under TestMiniLlapCliDriver, following exception is thrown

fields.summary: ClassCastException when running orc_vectorization_ppd.q under MiniLlap

comments.body: Also vectorization_limit.q, vectorization_div0.q and vector_non_string_partition.q has this issue.
